changeSet.author: Volkova_Natallia
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS airport ( code VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY, country VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL);

changeSet.author: Volkova_Natallia
Volkova_Natallia
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS seat ( aircraft_id INT NOT NULL, seat_no VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (aircraft_id, seat_no), FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES aircraft (id));

changeSet.author: Volkova_Natallia
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS flight ( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, flight_no VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, departure_date DATE NOT NULL, departure_airport_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, arrival_date DATE NOT NULL, arrival_airport_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, aircraft_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(departure_airport_code) REFERENCES airport (code), FOREIGN KEY(arrival_airport_code) REFERENCES airport(code), FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES aircraft(id));

changeSet.author: Volkova_Natallia
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ticket ( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, passport_no VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, passenger_name VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, flight_id INT NOT NULL, seat_no VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (flight_id) REFERENCES flight(id), FOREIGN KEY (flight_id, seat_no) REFERENCES seat(aircraft_id, seat_no) );
